about_the_game:
"Mariam Game" is a very interesting game, story, and gameplay. It depends on three styles of play, story mode, card mode, and action mode. "Mariam Game" draws inspiration from the life of a young girl in 18th-century Middle East, entwined in a mysterious connection with ghosts.
With careful attention to pacing, atmosphere, and storytelling, the horror in our game emanates from the atmosphere and storytelling, not from loud sounds and artificial effects.

Story Mode

It’s time to immerse yourself in the world of Mariam and help her get back to her home, making your own choices along the way. "Survival Horror", "Puzzle" and "Clicker" are developed by "Salman AlHarbi". It offers a hilarious arcade mode and an exciting adventure mode, along with drama and action. Immerse yourself in thousands of diverse worlds. The options are endless! Or get all the story hints by playing "Cards Mode" and completing all the levels.

Cards Mode

Offers an engaging and entertaining way to exercise memory recall, pattern recognition, and attention to detail. With vibrant graphics and intuitive gameplay, it provides a delightful experience for players of all ages.

Action Mode

Play a Action game where you need to last as long as possible in a minimalistic world. Hell is empty, and devils are all around. You have to survive until you can't anymore. Collect gold in each round to buy upgrades and improve your chances.

Game Characters

The witch's palace :

A sorceress residing in the palace behind the graveyard of the dead. She is light and moves using the winds, accompanied by a personal guardian named Alexander.

Haizbouna:

Living in the graveyard of the dead, she has surpassed a thousand years, with a personal guardian named Socrates, a young man injected with bat genes.

Shahrzad:

An extraordinarily beautiful character residing in the Valley of Ghosts, beside the king's palace. All the jinn armies are under her command, and her personal guard is named Kandy, a horror rabbit character.

Darius:

A king, wise and courageous leader allied with Shahrzad. His palace is located next to the Valley of Ghosts.
